author: Staff Reporter
text:
The 45th Safety Week celebration began at V.O. Chidambaranar Port Trust here on Friday.

S. Natarajan, Deputy Chairman of the Port, inaugurated it by hosting the safety flag.

He administered the safety and health pledge to the workers and the employees of the port.

In his address, Mr. Natarajan said that in order to maintain a safe working place, the working environment should be conducive and user-friendly and at the same time the personnel engaged in operational areas should also adhere to the safety procedures.

To create safety awareness, a procession by the staff and port users was taken out from V.O.C statue to multipurpose shed.

Competitions

Essay writing, slogan writing and drawing competition on safety aspects would be conducted for the port staff.

A safety awareness programme would be conducted for stevedore supervisors, truck drivers and heavy equipment operators, a statement also said.
title: Safety week celebration on at Thoothukudi port
